titles.title: Hallelujah, I'm walking with the King,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I'm walking with the King,
Praise His holy name, I'm walking with the King.
Hallelujah, I'm walking with the King,
Every day I'm walking with the King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The devil doesn't like it for I'm walking with ...
